channel.title: Pages on boblbobl
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on boblbobl

item.title: About
item.description:
My name is Lars Diget, and I’m a dad, husband, and maker. This blog intends to share any idea, thought, or inspiration, I might have, in the form of blog posts or photographs.

In my day job, I work for the best toy manufacturer in the world, the LEGO® Group, creating digital experiences for kids of all ages. Here I work as Senior Manager focusing on the engineering parts of our kids portfolio; which includes LEGO Play and kids.lego.com. I highly encourage and practice a show-don’t-tell approach to work; sometimes it is just a lot easier to communicate something by showing it, this can be using power point, a small prototype, or sometimes I even use video to tell a story.
